post.body: You'll be jealous. Saw 25 minutes (4 or 5 scenes) from Coraline and it was beautiful.
I know. I'm just alone and bored. I'm hoping he just looked at the wrong week on the schedule and shows up at 11.
...so you made a mocha? Maybe you could come work at the shop with me!
It depends on the reason. There are some reasons I'd be more forgiving. What worries me is I don't have a current # for him.
I'm sorry you're having a bad day. I love you. I'm sure there will be plenty of good chimichangas in Austin.
http://twitpic.com/qjj3 - That's freaking awesome.
Most shocking thing? I spent 24 hours in a movie theater watching all sorts of films. Including Soderbergh's 4+ hour "Che"
I think he can walk around with no shirt *and* have his super strength. 5 more eps. till uberwriter Bryan Fuller is back. yatta!
I forgot to tell you, last week on Heroes they re-set Mohinder. Pretty sure he has powers but is physically normal again.
5 min break. Ran out to car to twitter, cuz no cells allowed inside. Awesomeness so far.
http://twitpic.com/sbu3 -
http://twitpic.com/savi -
Is totally jealous of @greggrunberg for his In'N'Out burger order. But at least I get delicious TX BBQ this weekend.
Heard in the aiport parking lot, refering to the shuttle route name & alphabetized parking rows, "We take the Bear bus to Avenue Q. Cute."
Almost done running final errands for the store. And then I go home and pack. Then I leave for Austin, TX! Woohoo!
Computer clock messed up at work, thus tricking me into thinking I have an hour more left than I do. Tricksy computer.
My no-show's wife stopped in to tell me he is in the hospital. She's hoping they'll release him tomorrow and he'll be back to work Thursday.
Note to self. Re-do bin signs. 3/4 of customers read dark colored descriptions instead of light colored names.
I have an employee on her way so I don't have to be here the entire day by myself. The no-show is on probation.
Worried about my new employee. I really thought he would be a good hire, but this is the second time he's not shown up. Here by myself.
Working out tonight. It's late, but I suppose that's why they call it 24 hour fitness.
Sitting at the bank, waiting for the store deposits to be counted. Then off to Sam's Club. I like errand days, it gets me out of the store.
Spending my evening ironing dvd artwork. Why? So Bri can scan it, alter it to fit a slim case, and reprint it. Yes, we're that obsessive.
A regular customer I don't know that well just came in here crying and shared something very personal with me. Wasn't sure how to react.
I feel a bit like planes, trains, and automobiles. Classic movie.
From the plane to the bus that takes us to our car so we can drive 1 1/2 hours home.
Just looked at an apartment/townhouse for rent in Austin. Pictures online looked cheesy, but the space is nice. 3bd/3bth.
Have also watched some really cool 3D stuff. And 45 minutes of "Up" the new Pixar. Nice!
5 min break, out to the car yet again to text. Just watched "I Love You, Man" the new Paul Rudd/Jason Segel comedy. Pretty funny stuff.
speaking of @cadicandra 's warm comfy thoughts, I'm drinking a Caribou 'Lite White Berry' and eating a blackberry white choc scone. Nom nom
Learned to make Italian Sausage, and spent time with my 1 yr old nephew. Pretty good day.
Dressing room after dressing room. Finding job interview clothes.
http://twitpic.com/xfpn - Saw this at Half Price Books and got a kick out of it.
http://twitpic.com/x20f - My nephew hamming it up for the camera.
http://twitpic.com/x1tr -
http://twitpic.com/wsky - Some people keep photos of family on their desk. Others keep photos of Nick Cage
http://twitpic.com/weiz - My nephew William playing with toys on the pool table.
http://twitpic.com/w7f8 - My adorable nephew upset that his present wasn't working right.
Our plane is going from Co Spgs to MSP to Austin. Maybe we should stay on the plane and go somewhere awesome and warm instead of freezing!
Small airport on Christmas eve = no wait at all through security. woot.
I'm half tempted to run to a store and buy something to pit olives with. Who wants to pit olives at 9pm on a Tuesday night?
http://twitpic.com/vsbg - Christmas present from my husband. Have I mentioned that my husband is awesome?
I'm glad to get to know her better but it sucks that it happened right before I move away.
She and I have similar taste in films. She wants to open an independant theater. I said to visit me in Austin & I'd show her the Drafthouse.
Back to being in a good mood. Just had a great convo with a former coworker. She wants to get together and have a 10 hr Eddie Izzardathon.
Yeah, everything is fine with the health department. It's just nerve-wracking having them here looking over everything.
So much for it being a good day. had someone go home sick so we're short staffed, and the health dept. came unannounced.
